```{r setup, include=FALSE}

theme_set(theme_minimal())
library(lmerTest)

library(coretta2018itapol)
data("token_measures")
```

# Read data

```{r read-data}
voicing <- token_measures

voicing_voiceless <- filter(voicing, c2_phonation == "voiceless", c1_phonation == "voiceless")

voicing_voiced <- filter(voicing, c2_phonation == "voiced", c1_phonation == "voiceless")

voicing_norm <- voicing_voiceless %>%
  filter(voicing_duration < 250) %>%
  group_by(speaker) %>%
  mutate(voicing_duration_norm = scale(voicing_duration))
```

# Lmer

```{r voicing-lm}
voicing_filtered <- voicing_voiceless %>%
  filter(
    voicing_duration < 250,
    speaker != "it12"
  ) %>%
  na.omit()

voicing_lm <- lmer(
  voicing_duration ~
    vowel +
    language +
    vowel:language +
    (1+vowel|speaker) +
    (1|item),
  data = voicing_filtered,
  REML = FALSE
)
summary(voicing_lm)

voicing_lm_null <- lmer(
  voicing_duration ~
    vowel +
    language +
#    vowel:language +
    (1+vowel|speaker) +
    (1|item),
  data = filter(voicing_voiceless, voicing_duration < 250, speaker != "it12"),
  REML = FALSE
)

anova(voicing_lm_null, voicing_lm)

voicing_lm_null_2 <- lmer(
  voicing_duration ~
#    vowel +
    language +
#    vowel:language +
    (1+vowel|speaker) +
    (1|item),
  data = filter(voicing_voiceless, voicing_duration < 250, speaker != "it12"),
  REML = FALSE
)

anova(voicing_lm_null_2, voicing_lm_null)

voicing_lm_null_3 <- lmer(
  voicing_duration ~
#    vowel +
    language +
#    vowel:language +
    (1|speaker) +
    (1|item),
  data = filter(voicing_voiceless, voicing_duration < 250, speaker != "it12"),
  REML = FALSE
)

anova(voicing_lm_null_3, voicing_lm_null_2)
```

```{r italian-polish}

```

```{r italian-polish-null}

```

It seems vowel identity does not affect voicing duration (neither in Italian nor Polish).

# Power analysis

```{r}
fixef(voicing_lm)["vowelu"] <- 4

powerSim(voicing_lm, test = fixed("vowelu", method = "z"), nsim = 50)
```

```{r}
fixef(voicing_lm)["vowelu"] <- 10

powerSim(voicing_lm, test = fixed("vowelu", method = "z"), nsim = 50)
```

## Simulated data

```{r}
set.seed(8788)

durations <- NULL

for (i in 1:30) {
  durations <- c(durations, rnorm(50, 135, 30), rnorm(50, 135, 30) + 5)
}

sim_data <- tibble(
  duration = durations,
  height = rep(rep(c("high", "low"), each = 50), 30),
  subject = rep(1:30, each = 100)
) %>%
  mutate(
    height = factor(height),
    subject = factor(subject)
  )
```

```{r}
sim_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(height, duration)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~ subject)
```


```{r}
voicing_sim_lm <- lmer(
  duration ~
    height +
    (1|subject),
  data = sim_data
)
summary(voicing_sim_lm)
```

```{r}
fixef(voicing_sim_lm)["heightlow"] <- 5

sim <- powerCurve(voicing_sim_lm, along = "subject", seed = 8788)
plot(sim)
```

```{r}
fixef(voicing_sim_lm)["heightlow"] <- 2

sim_3 <- powerCurve(voicing_sim_lm, along = "subject", nsim = 20)
plot(sim_3)
```
